direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve removing elements from the collection, but 'removeAll' removes all elements in the specified collection.
Both methods involve removing elements based on a condition, but 'removeIf' uses a predicate to determine which elements to remove.
Both methods modify the collection by removing elements, but 'retainAll' retains only the elements in the specified collection.
Both methods involve modifying the collection, but 'clear' removes all elements from the collection.
